alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 16 at 3:16PM PST until January 17 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. Winds will cause blowing and drifting of snow. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley. * WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Blowing and drifting of snow will cause the visbility to decrease in a short period of time.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
